steps.title: Welcome to the Debt Collective
steps.raw_description:
Hello! Ready to get started disputing your debt?

When you join the Debt Collective you will be placed into a group based on your debt type. These groups are called **Collectives**. You will be able to meet other people in your situation to share information and learn how to fight back together against creditors and collectors. 

As a member, you will also have access to our series of debt dispute tools. Our organizing team is available to support you every step of the way.

**You are not a loan!**

To begin, click **Next**

Welcome!
